name: Could you let me in...?
description:
You're a turtle bouncer for a High Class party. Will you obey your employer and turn down the neighbors...or will you challenge the establishment and let EVERYONE in?

A short, heartwarming game made for the Wholesome Games Jam 2022.

Leaflet : Programming, Audio, Writing
(Twitter, Bandcamp, Youtube)
Christa Paolucci : Portraits & Big Art
(Twitter, Website , Itch page)
marcherin : Small Art & UI
(Art Twitter & Pixel Art Twitter, Itch page)

Listen to the game's soundtrack on Soundcloud

:)
